version_description: Our latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
Our latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
Our latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
Our latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
Our latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
Mischief Managed! You may have noticed some marauding bugs but we've stopped them getting up to no good.
Mischief Managed! You may have noticed some marauding bugs but we've stopped them getting up to no good.
Has anyone got a Vanishing Charm for all these bugs? Oh, not to worry. We do.
Has anyone got a Vanishing Charm for all these bugs? Oh, not to worry. We do.

The latest Wizarding World app release is here! Look forward to…
- Trouble navigating around the app and keep ending back on your feed? Maybe there were a few Doxys in there. Regardless, we’ve now nuked them.
- Gold subscribers can now discover our new puzzle selection in Discover.
- We practiced our Lumos spell and have made some improvements in dark mode - take a look!
- Some general spring cleaning all over the app in general. No Scourgify needed here.

· Like Portkeys, new navigation improvements link you to Wizarding Weeklies, the Sorting experience and Learn about Gold
 · Our enhanced eBook experience now offers read percentage, progress bar, tappable covers, and eBook animations – think wizarding photographs!
 · Nifflers would love our new promotional placements for Wizarding World Gold. Check out profile, discover and vault
 · Extendable Ears alert – our audio is now compatible with other apps
 · Scourgify! We've fixed some pesky bugs too

· Want magical news and updates? Members will now be able to opt-in and out of receiving our emails within the Wizarding World app itself.

 · We've managed some mischievous bugs affecting in-app notifications. All users should now receive notifications when opted in.

· No need to ask Madam Pince for recommendations – you can now discover related content once you’ve finished reading an article.
· Do you wish you could share answers as often as Hermione? No problem! You’ll now start to see polls appearing in articles, as well as recent posts from Wizarding World Instagram and Twitter.
· Revelio! We’ve fixed our videos so you get a sneak peek before you press play!
· We’ve also consulted Gilderoy Lockhart’s Guide to Household Pests and banished some pesky bugs

· We've managed some mischief affecting videos for Gold members, so now you'll get a viewing experience as good as a wizarding photograph
 · Galleons at the ready! It's now even easier to shop for magical products at the Wizarding World shop

· Like a virtual trip to Madam Malkin's Robes for All Occasions, we've updated the app's look to bring you magic at it's most beautiful
· Current and returning users, including those with accounts from Pottermore, will experience smoother registrations and log-ins to help them step into the wizarding world more easily - rather like Floo Powder!
· We've managed some mischievous bugs affecting log-in.
